packagegui.description: FreeSWITCH is an open source telephony platform designed to facilitate the creation of voice and chat driven products scaling from a soft-phone up to a soft-switch. It can be used as a simple switching engine, a PBX, a media gateway or a media server to host IVR applications using simple scripts or XML to control the callflow.

field.description: Enter the numbering plan here. example: US
Enter the default gateway name here.
Enter the area code here. example: 918
Enter the event socket port here. default: 8021
Enter the event socket password here. default: ClueCon
Enter the XML RPC HTTP Port here. default: 8787
Enter the XML RPC Auth Realm here. default: freeswitch
Enter the XML RPC Auth User here. default: freeswitch
Enter the XML RPC Auth Password here. default: works
Enter a admin pin number. Used to authenticate the admin from the phone.
Enter the SMTP host address. If you using a different port append it on the end with a colon. e.g. smtp.gmail.com:465
Select the SMTP security. None, TLS, SSL
Use SMTP Authentication true or false.
Enter the SMTP From email address.
